titleStmt.title: Mortalities meditation: or, A description of sinne VVith a definition and plaine setting forth of mans three chiefest and greatest enemies; to wit, the world, the flesh, and the Diuell. Written by William Hall.
titleStmt.author: Hall, William, fl. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Aug. Mathewes, for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster Row, at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Pater-noster Row, at the signe of the Talbot
